original_text: And the daughter of any priest, if she profanes herself by whoring, profanes her father; she shall be burned with fire.
korean_text: 어떤 제사장의 딸이든지 행음하여 자신을 속되게 하면 그의 아버지를 속되게 함이니 그를 불사를지니라

sentences.original_text: And the daughter of any priest
if she profanes herself by whoring
she shall be burned with fire
